# Install `sceptre` v0.99.x

To install the latest version of `sceptre` from GitHub (currently v0.99.x, i.e. the beta version of `sceptre` 1.0.0), please run the following code from your R console:

```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools") # if necessary
devtools::install_github("katsevich-lab/sceptre")
```

# Install `sceptre` v0.3.0

To install the previous stable version of the package (v0.3.0), please run the following code from your R console:

```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools") # if necessary
devtools::install_github("katsevich-lab/sceptre", ref = "v0.3.0")
```

We recommend that users switch to `sceptre` v0.99.x as soon as they can.
